item.title: 3 dead, suspect in custody after shooting at Target in Austin
item.description: Three people were killed and a suspect was arrested after a shooting at a Target store parking lot in North Austin, police said.

item.title: Tropical Storm Erin forms, could become Atlantic's first hurricane this season
item.description: Tropical Storm Erin was expected to become a hurricane later in the week.

item.title: At least 1 killed, 1 missing after explosions at U.S. Steel Clairton plant
item.description: At least one person has died, and one person remains unaccounted for, while at least 10 people have been injured following multiple explosions at the ...

item.title: Sec. McMahon kicks off tour promoting state-led education
item.description: Education Secretary Linda McMahon is touring the country to promote state-led education plans.

item.title: Paramount acquires UFC rights in 7-year deal with TKO Group
item.description: Paramount will become the new home to all UFC events in the U.S., while UFC's CEO says the White House may host a July 4 event broadcast on CBS.
